moodCompass.title: 🧭 Your Mood Compass
moodCompass.subtitle: How are you feeling today? Choose a direction.

moodResponses.focus: Make a small to-do list with maximum 3 points. Focus through clarity!
moodResponses.hopeful: Remember: Even small steps lead forward.
moodResponses.overwhelmed: Take a deep breath and try to tackle just ONE thing.
moodResponses.tired: Consciously give yourself 10 minutes break – without screen.
moodResponses.angry: Go outside briefly or move around – it helps release pressure.
moodResponses.empty: Do something simple – listen to music, shower, drink something warm.
moodResponses.anxious: Say out loud what scares you. It relieves immediately.
moodResponses.proud: Well done! Write down what makes you proud today.

guide.title: Find Psychotherapist 🧭
guide.insuranceMethod: Ask your health insurance (hotline, lists, consultation).
guide.directCallMethod: Call practices directly and ask about available spots & waiting lists.
guide.clinicSocialService: Ask the clinic's social service for recommendations.
guide.emergencyServices: Use emergency services when quick help is needed!
guide.trustPersonNote: Always talk to trusted people – and use the emergency numbers in the menu when in doubt 🚨.
